element.definition: An integer indicating the number of additional times (aka refills or repeats) the patient can receive the prescribed medication.   Usage Notes: This integer does NOT include the original order dispense.   This means that if an order indicates dispense 30 tablets plus  "3 repeats", then the order can be dispensed a total of 4 times and the patient can receive a total of 120 tablets.
element.comments: If displaying "number of authorized refills", subtract 1 from this number.
